subject: Checkout failing after headless migration
description: Since we moved to the new headless checkout, customers are seeing 'Payment processing failed' errors at the final step. This started 2 hours ago and we've had 47 failed transactions.

subject: Webhook notifications not being received
description: Our fulfillment system stopped receiving order webhooks. We're using the v2 endpoint but getting 404 errors. Migration was completed yesterday.

subject: Product prices showing incorrectly on storefront
description: After the migration, some products are displaying the wrong prices. The catalog API returns correct data but the storefront shows old cached prices.

subject: API rate limits exceeded during inventory sync
description: We're getting 429 errors when trying to sync our 50,000 SKU inventory. The old system handled this fine. Need help with the new rate limits.

subject: Payment callback URL configuration
description: Follow-up to TKT-2024-001: Our payment provider says the callback URL format changed in headless. Where do we update this in the new dashboard?

subject: Cart abandonment tracking broken
description: Our analytics show zero cart abandonment events since migration. The tracking script is installed but events aren't firing.
